Whether you are a graduate student, conducting research, working towards a tenure, or you would like to advance your professional career in science, technology or academia, you will find this course greatly helpful.  You will no longer have to struggle or spend countless hours figuring out how to start your research paper, only to have it turn out not as good as you hoped. This “Writing Research Papers: How to Write Research Paper Effectively” course will provide you with the valuable research guidance from a scholar with over 28 years of experience in research and teaching in higher education. Dr. Mohammad Noori has published over 200 technical and professional papers and currently serves as the technical editor, associate editor and a member of the editorial board of several prestigious journals. Take this Writing Research Papers course now and learn how to write research paper effectively.
